In an effort to provide clarity because there have been some questions about snow makeup days:

Effective the 19/20 school year, there was a revision in the state statute about the number of school days required. Based on this revision, we designed our school calendar to both meet and exceed school day requirements.

Therefore, even if we experience a snowpocalypse and/or snowmageddon type event, we will not have any school days that will need to be made up.

In other words, the 19/20 school calendar which has our last day of school on May 22 will NOT change as a result of inclement weather days.

For reference, please take a moment to review our 19/20 school calendar. #unionrxi #Uproud

Good evening, #unionrxi families. The 'back to school' excitement is upon us. Whether you are a student, parent, or staff member... getting a full night's rest may be difficult this evening.

The anticipation... the uncertainty... the possibility.

On behalf of the entire Union R-XI School District, we are humbled by the opportunity to serve the students and parents of our community.

Please know, we don't take this responsibility lightly.

Tomorrow morning, you will send us your most cherished possession... your children. The opportunity to work with and learn alongside your children is an absolute honor.

Each of our students has a story to tell and we are privileged to be a part of that story.

In closing, if you're looking for a few words of wisdom to share with your children this evening, let them know they will be cared for, they will be listened to, they will be respected, and lastly and most importantly, they will feel valued.

Have a wonderful school year in #unionrxi.

Calling all substitute teachers!

At our March Board of Education meeting, the Board of Education voted to increase the daily rate for substitute teachers in #unionrxi.

The daily rate has increased from $85 to $95 per day.

For long term substitute teaching positions (11 or more consecutive days for the same teacher), the rate has increased from $95 to $105 starting on day 11 if the substitute teacher does NOT have teacher certification.

If the substitute teacher has teacher certification and is doing a long term position, the rate is $200 per day starting on day 11 and days 1-10 are $105.

These new rates are active as of April 1, 2019.

We have a great group of substitute teachers, however, we are always looking for more student-centered substitute teachers. If this position is of interest to you, please apply here: https://unionrxi.tedk12.com/hire/index.aspx.

To be a substitute teacher you need to have a Content Substitute Certificate, which requires a minimum of 60 qualified college credit hours. Learn more here from DESE's website: https://goo.gl/NrNYIT.
